mapper.insert: insert into tb_board(writer_idx, title, content) values (#{writerIdx}, #{title}, #{content});
mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS rownum, a.idx as idx, b.NICKNAME as nick_name, a.title as title, a.CONTENT as content , a.SYSREGDATE as sysregdate, a.VIEW_CNT as view_cnt, a.LIKE_CNT AS like_cnt, total_cd FROM tb_board a, tb_user b, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP WHERE a.use_yn = 'Y' AND a.total_cd = #{fill} AND a.WRITER_IDX = b.IDX) c ORDER BY c.idx DESC, c.sysregdate DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_board WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND total_cd = #{fill}
